title: Building Reports with BigQuery + Looker Studio

metadata.summary: Build visual reports and dashboards using LimaCharlie data exported to BigQuery and analyzed with Google Looker Studio
metadata.primary_use_case: Create custom security reports and dashboards by exporting filtered EDR telemetry to BigQuery and visualizing in Looker Studio

extracted_apis.description: Configure BigQuery output for Windows network connections with custom transform
Transform to extract hostname, command line, and username from NETWORK_CONNECTIONS events

cross_refs.description: Base BigQuery output configuration required for this reporting tutorial
